title: Remove %HP.
body:
It's a toxic addition to the game that really should only be allowed on few characters. It shouldn't be allowed on tanks because a tank should be allowed to deal damage.

Champs that have %HP tend to go to lcs a lot more.

* Fizz
* Shyvana
* Maokai
* Gnar
* Gragas
* Lee Sin
* Zed
* Ekko
* Nidalee

These champions went mad with power at some point and had to be nerfed. 

Now why does % Hp exist? Especially on tanks, when their primary goal is to absorb damage and CC, and not so much chip away at your HP bar (Hi Shyvana, hi Gnar. Sup Fizz)
